trigger.name: Mysqld is not running on {HOSTNAME}
trigger.description:
MySQL is not running.
It has been stopped / shutdown or has crashed. Check on the server for more details: - w / last - dmesg logs - /var/log/messages - mysql error logs

trigger.name: Mysqld_safe is not running on {HOSTNAME}
trigger.description:
MySQL is not running.
It has been stopped / shutdown or has crashed. Check on the server for more details: - w / last - dmesg logs - /var/log/messages - mysql error logs

trigger.name: MySQL has been restarted on {HOSTNAME}
trigger.description:
MySQL has been restarted. Uptime is less than 1h.
It has been stopped / shutdown or has crashed. Check on the server for more details: - w / last - dmesg logs - /var/log/messages - mysql error logs
